mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.`name`, s.`status`, s.`category_id` AS categoryId, s.`subject_type_id` AS subjectTypeId, s.`difficulty`, s.`updated_time` AS updatedTime, t.`name` AS subjectType, c.`name` AS category, d.`value` AS subjectDifficulty FROM t_subject s, t_subject_type t, t_category c, t_dictionary d WHERE s.`category_id`=c.`id` AND s.`subject_type_id`=t.`id` and s.status = 1 and s.`difficulty` = d.`id`
